text: aur ve allaah ke siva, unakee ibaadat (vandana) karate hain, jo na to unhen koee haani pahuncha sakate hain aur na koee laabh aur kahate hain ye allaah ke yahaan, hamaare abhistaavak (siphaarishee) hain, aap kahiyeh kya tum allaah ko aisee baat kee soochana de rahe ho, jisake hone ko na vah aakaashon mein jaanata hai aur na dharatee mein? vah pavitr aur uchch hai, us shirk (mishranavaad) se, jo ve kar rahe hain
